name: Ghost House (Whalics)
description:
Ghost House is the University of Texas at Dallas ATEC Game Lab's Spring 2022 project. The game is a point-and-click narrative game developed by a team of roughly sixty student developers over the course of one semester.

In Ghost House, you play as a ghost and work to help mend the relationship of your struggling family while simultaneously discovering your own identity.

The game includes four major characters with interactable dialog and four seasons that each contain unique content. Utilize the journal system to discover your next steps and keep track of your interactions! 

Play through all four seasons and choose your interactions carefully as these choices will determine the fate of the Graves family.
